page_title_en: Absurd 80 For Brady Trailer Shows Rita Moreno Eating An Edible And Seeing Six Guy Fieris
page_description_en: The film is inspired by the true story of four older women who love Tom Brady so much that they went to the Super Bowl to see him without tickets.
page_text_html:
The first trailer for 80 For Brady has arrived, and it includes a scene where Oscar-winning actress Rita Moreno eats a powerful edible and sees six Guy Fieris sitting at a dinner table.

The film is inspired by the true story of four older who love football superstar Tom Brady and go on a journey to Super Bowl LI to watch him play. The film features Lily Tomlin, Jane Fonda, Sally Field, and Moreno as the four women, with appearances by Brady (who is also a producer) and Guy Fieri, among others.

The women love Brady and the New England Patriots so much that they travel to Super Bowl LI without tickets, hoping to find a way in. A bunch of wild stuff happens on their way to getting into the stadium to watch Brady and the Patriots eventually overcome a 28-3 deficit to beat the Atlanta Falcons for the title. In one standout scene from the trailer, Moreno eats an edible and has a wild trip featuring the host of Diners, Drive-Ins, and Dives.

80 For Brady comes to theaters on February 3, 2023, which is one week before Super Bowl LVII.

In addition to Tomlin, Fonda, Moreno, and Field, the movie features Billy Porter and cameos by former Patriots players Rob Gronkowski and Julian Edelman. Kyle Marvin (The Climb, Kicks) directed the film.
